description: In the Bus Driving Simulator 24 - City Roads game, this DLC introduces a new Double Decker Bus. This iconic vehicle is a prominent feature, known for its distinctive two-tiered design. With a spacious interior and large windows on both levels, players can experience a realistic simulation of driving a double-decker bus through the city streets.
name: Bus Driving Simulator 24 - City Roads DLC London Double Decker Bus
